body.name: Scott 1000 Toilet Paper, 8 Rolls, Septic-Safe, 1-Ply Toilet Tissue

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 8 REGULAR-SIZED ROLLS: 8 rolls of Scott 1000 Toilet Paper, 1-ply—the same trusted performance and long-lasting rolls, now with a new look; packaging may vary from images shown
A TRUSTED BRAND: For generations, you’ve trusted Scott—our septic-safe toilet paper uses clog-free technology, lasts longer and dissolves faster* and breaks down 10x faster**
1000 SHEETS PER ROLL: America’s #1 long lasting brand and you always get 1000 sheets per roll for fewer roll changes
SIMPLY MADE: Free of perfumes or scents, so no need to worry about allergies or irritation
SUSTAINABLY SOURCED: Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue
body.description: Scott 1000 Toilet Paper helps you spend time on what matters most with fewer roll changes and more value. With Scott 1000 Toilet Paper, you get 8 rolls of 1,000 sheets, so you have plenty of toilet paper for you and your loved ones. Plus, each roll of Scott 1000 bathroom tissue helps you get the job done with 1000 durable 1-layer sheets and lasts longer, dissolves faster* and breaks down 10x faster**. Scott 1000 1-ply toilet paper even dissolves quickly, so it’s kinder to your plumbing, sewer-safe and septic-safe. We’ve been trusted for generations: Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue. Keep life rolling by ordering Scott 1000 in bulk online! *vs the leading brand mega roll **vs the leading brand one ply

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's very thin to not stick in pipes. No clogs yet and my pipes are from 1965, and were clogging.
reviews.reviewText: We had to avoid using the back toilet because of the old clogging pipes. I'm SO glad I decided to look for TP that falls apart. This got the best reviews. It is single ply and falls apart quickly. Even though you'd have to use more squares, that is ok because they still fall apart faster than 2 ply. This will be forever in our back bathroom and RVs now. It's GREAT to have no costly issues anymore! I did not give a good rating for softness and absorbency because it is just thin paper. It does the job fine though! We cannot use the thick cushy stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last long and doesn’t clog
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Scott products all my life. I should have bought stock in the company decades ago lol 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is it!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best toilet paper because it does as advertised. Great toilet paper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for train my kids to use toilet paper thoughtfully!
reviews.reviewText: I use this product for our kids bathroom. They hate this toilet tissue because “Too thin!”. Actually I t’s great for those little kids. Because when they were using 2 play thick toilet paper, they never fold the paper and waste a lot… I don’t know why they take such long paper and wipe on the edge… anyway. Now my kids carefully fold the papers and no clogs so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent price decent quality
reviews.reviewText: I grew up with this stuff in the house. It's economy. It's cleansing. Just make sure to use enough, or, much like the James Webb telescope, you'll be discovering the inner workings of Uranus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good bargain for quality Scott toilet paper.
reviews.reviewText: I recently noticed my supply of toilet paper was running low and after browsing on Amazon I came across this product (Scott, 8 rolls of toilet paper) at a good price and purchased it.I was happy with the delivery service, and I am pleased with my purchase.Rating: 5 Stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe for the pipes
reviews.reviewText: If you prefer "thin" toilet paper, as I do, then this is the brand for you. I always worry about the pipes clogging, so I buy thin toilet paper. It's a matter of preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved our cast iron 1969 pipes
reviews.reviewText: Was getting all sorts of clogs in our cast iron 1969 pipes but since we’ve switched to this toilet paper, zero issues!
